see around.translation[0].definitions[0]: to notice someone regularly in places you go to, but not talk to them
I don’t know who he is, but I’ve seen him around.
see around.translation[0].definitions[1]: used to say goodbye to someone when you have not made a definite arrangement to meet again
see around.translation[0].definitions[2]: to visit a place and walk around looking at it
Would you like to see round the house?
